channel.title: [562] Coding in a PROPER Working IPBan and IPMute $$
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Ive been interacted with too many bullshit. 1st Some moron keeps trying to Spam his Server out, worst i can do is Mute\Ban Him. Then sit back and ban his other Accounts untill either one of us gets bored. As you know 562s don't have IP Bann\IP Mute unless their Coders have Coded it in. I got all the Codes needed, but when i Compile, i have 7 Erroes (Can't be bothered loading them in because i want an experienced Coder. If you Code me in a 110% PROPER WORKING IP Ban and IP Mute i [b]WILL[/b] pay you $$$ Via PayPal.
No Scam Either, So don't F##k me around and i won't F##K you around.
Add me on msn: Skilluhpkh@hotmail.com
Glad to hear from you, if you do add me. Cheers.
